items.title: 岐阜・愛知で火事相次ぐ 子ども2人と連絡とれず 2人死亡

items.summary: なぜアメリカが買収？ グリーンランドってどんなところ？
items.summary_zh: 什么是格陵兰?

items.title: Trump threatens new tariffs on countries opposed to Greenland takeover
items.title_zh: 特朗普威胁对反对格陵兰接管的国家实行新关税.
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has threatened to place tariffs on nations that do not go along with his ambitions to annex Greenland.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)曾威胁要对不符合他吞并格陵兰野心的国家征收关税.

items.title: 【随時更新】阪神・淡路大震災から31年 地震発生時刻に黙とう

items.title: Uganda's president heads for victory as his main rival cries foul
items.title_zh: 乌干达总统为胜利而奋起奔走,
items.summary: Uganda's President Yoweri Museveni has taken a commanding lead in Thursday's presidential election - well ahead of his main challenger Bobi Wine, whose party has already questioned the credibility of the results.
items.summary_zh: 乌干达总统约韦里·穆塞韦尼在星期四的总统选举中发挥了指挥作用——远远领先于他的主要挑战者博比·温德,他的政党已经对选举结果的可信度提出了质疑.

items.title: イラン反政府デモ 現地メディア“3000人拘束” 規制強化か
items.title_zh: 伊朗反政府示威 地方媒体"3000人克制"强化
items.summary: イラン外相 “米がデモを支援” 対応の正当性訴え米をけん制か
items.summary_zh: 伊朗外交部长“美国帮助德莫”

items.title: 中道改革連合 基本政策の策定など急ぐ 自民 批判やつなぎ止め
items.title_zh: 基本政策等
items.summary: 立民・公明の新党 名称は「中道改革連合」に
items.summary_zh: 文革和文明新党名取自"内地改革联盟".

items.title: プルデンシャル生命31億円不適切受領 金融庁は厳しく対処へ
items.title_zh: 审慎生活 310亿日元 不当收受
items.summary: プルデンシャル生命 社員ら100人余が顧客から31億円不適切受領
items.summary_zh: 100多名员工从顾客那里得到30亿日元的不当待遇

items.title: 大学入学共通テスト きょうから始まる 49万6000人余が受験予定
items.title_zh: 大学招生 普通考试 46 000名学生
items.summary: JR山手線の停電トラブル 67万人余に影響 感電防止装置に不具合
items.summary_zh: JR山诺特线路断电 超过6万人

items.title: Exiled crown prince urges world to help protesters topple Iran's government
items.title_zh: 流亡的王储敦促世界帮助抗议者推翻伊朗政府。
items.summary: The exiled son of the last Iranian shah (king) has called on the world to help protesters topple Iran's government, saying he is confident "the Islamic Republic will fall - not if, but when".
items.summary_zh: 伊朗上个沙赫被放逐的儿子(国王)呼吁世界帮助抗议者推翻伊朗政府,

items.title: Machado vows to lead Venezuela 'when right time comes'
items.title_zh: Machado发誓,"当时机成熟时,
items.summary: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado has vowed she will lead the country "when the right time comes".
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉反对派领袖玛丽亚·科琳娜·马查多(María Corina Machado)曾发誓,"在适当时机到来后"将领导国家.

items.title: Man accused of murdering woman and toddler in Munich car attack goes on trial
items.title_zh: 被控在慕尼黑谋杀女人和小孩的人正在受审
items.summary: A man has gone on trial in Germany charged with driving his car into a crowd of people in the city of Munich last year, killing two people.
items.summary_zh: 一名男子在德国受审,被控去年开车撞上慕尼黑市的人群,造成两人死亡.

items.title: Myanmar begins defence in landmark genocide case at UN court
items.title_zh: 缅甸开始在联合国法庭进行具有里程碑意义的种族灭绝案件的辩护
items.summary: Myanmar has denied committing genocide against the Ronhingya people, saying The Gambia has failed to provide enough proof, as it begun its defence at the UN's top court.
items.summary_zh: 缅甸否认对朗兴亚人民犯下种族灭绝罪行, 表示冈比亚未能提供足够的证据,

items.title: Who is Reza Pahlavi, the son of Iran's last shah?
items.title_zh: 谁是雷扎·帕哈拉维,伊朗上个沙赫之子?
items.summary: 65-year-old Reza Pahlavi, the exiled son of Iran's last shah has been a prominent voice calling for protests to continue in the country.
items.summary_zh: 伊朗上个沙赫被放逐之子、65岁的雷扎·帕哈拉维,

items.title: CIA director had two-hour meeting with new Venezuelan leader in Caracas
items.title_zh: CIA局长在加拉加斯 和委内瑞拉新领导人会面了两个小时
items.summary: CIA director John Ratcliffe met Venezuela's Interim President Delcy Rodríguez in Caracas on Thursday "at President Trump's direction," a US official has said.
items.summary_zh: 美国中央情报局主任约翰·拉特克利夫星期四在加拉加斯会见了委内瑞拉临时总统德尔西·罗德里格斯"在特朗普总统的指示下",一位美国官员说.

items.title: China and Canada announce tariffs relief after a high-stakes meeting between Carney and Xi
items.title_zh: 中国和加拿大在卡尼和习近平举行高层会谈后宣布减免关税
items.summary: Chinese leader Xi Jinping and Canadian PM Mark Carney have announced lower tariffs, signalling a reset in their countries' relationship after a key meeting in Beijing.
items.summary_zh: 中国领导人习近平和加拿大总理马克·卡尼宣布降低关税,表示在北京举行重要会议后两国关系重起.

items.title: 'I was hit in the face by pellets': Iranians on border describe violence and more protests
items.title_zh: "我被子弹击中了脸": 伊朗边境人士描述暴力和更多抗议活动。
items.summary: At the border crossing from Iran into Iraqi Kurdistan, the stern face of Iran's former supreme leader, Ayatollah Khomeini, peers down at the trickle of Iranians leaving the territory.
items.summary_zh: 在从伊朗进入伊拉克库尔德斯坦的边境口岸,伊朗前最高领导人阿亚图拉·霍梅尼的严酷面孔,在伊朗人离开伊拉克领土的花花边倒下。

items.title: US accuses South Africa military of 'cosying up to Iran'
items.title_zh: 美国指责南非军方「与伊朗为敌」。
items.summary: The US has accused South Africa's defence ministry of refusing to obey orders from its own government to send home Iranian warships that have been conducting naval exercises in the African country's waters.
items.summary_zh: 美国指责南非国防部拒绝服从本国政府的命令,将一直在非洲国家水域进行海军演习的伊朗军舰送回家去.

items.title: Tragic death of Adichie's young son pushes Nigeria to act on health sector failings
items.title_zh: Adichie年轻儿子不幸去世,
items.summary: A series of harrowing cases of allegations of medical negligence, including the death of novelist Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie's 21-month-old son, has ignited a fierce debate about patient safety within Nigeria's healthcare system.
items.summary_zh: 包括小说家奇马曼达·恩戈齐·阿迪奇(Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie)21个月长的儿子之死,

items.title: Julio Iglesias denies sexual assault allegations
items.title_zh: Julio Iglesias否认性侵犯指控
items.summary: Singer Julio Iglesias has denied allegations of sexual assault made by two female former employees.
items.summary_zh: Singer Julio Iglesias否认两名前女性雇员提出的性侵犯指控。

items.title: Venezuelan Nobel Peace Prize winner presents her medal to Trump
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉诺贝尔和平奖得主向特朗普颁奖
items.summary: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado has given her Nobel Peace Prize medal to President Donald Trump during a meeting at the White House, saying it was a recognition of his commitment to her country's freedom.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉反对派领袖玛丽亚·科琳娜·马查多在白宫的一次会议上向总统唐纳德·特朗普颁发了她的诺贝尔和平奖奖章,称这是对他致力于国家自由的承认.

items.title: S Korea's ex-president Yoon to be jailed for five years over martial law bid
items.title_zh: 韩国前总统尹相正因戒严竞价入狱五年
items.summary: South Korea's impeached president Yoon Suk Yeol will be jailed for five years over abuse of power, obstructing justice and falsifying documents in relation to his failed martial law bid in 2024.
items.summary_zh: 韩国被弹劾会长尹硕烈将因滥用职权被处以5年有期徒刑,妨碍司法公正,并伪造与他2024年未通过戒严招标有关的文件.

items.title: South Korea's impeached president found guilty in first of four trials: What you need to know
items.title_zh: 韩国被弹劾会长在四起审判中首发被判有罪: 你该知道的事
items.summary: South Korea's beleaguered ex-president Yoon Suk Yeol has been found guilty of abuse of power, falsifying documents and obstructing justice when he tried and failed to impose martial law in the country in 2024. He has also been sentenced to five years in jail.
items.summary_zh: 韩国被纠缠的前总统尹淑烈被判定滥用职权,伪造证件并妨碍司法公正,2024年他在国内审判并未能实施戒严. 他还被判处五年监禁。

items.title: Trump's Fed fight looks like something from another country
items.title_zh: 特朗普的美联储争斗 看起来像来自别国的东西
items.summary: A political leader demanding questionable policy from the central bank and testing the legal limits to get it - to Martin Redrado, sitting in Argentina, Donald Trump's stand-off with the Federal Reserve feels surprisingly familiar.
items.summary_zh: 一位政治领袖要求央行采取有问题的政策, 并测试获得政策的法律限制,

items.title: Cuba counts cost of alliance after 32 troops killed in Venezuela
items.title_zh: 在委内瑞拉有32名军人被击毙后,
items.summary: From sunrise, throngs of military personnel, government officials and civilians lined the route between Havana's airport and the Armed Forces Ministry to applaud home the remains of 32 Cuban troops killed in Venezuela as they passed by in a funeral cortege.
items.summary_zh: 从日出起,大批军事人员、政府官员和平民排出哈瓦那机场和武装部队部之间的路线,为32名在委内瑞拉死于丧葬地的古巴士兵的遗体鼓掌。

items.title: 'Baby, don't move': Australian woman wakes to find massive python on her chest
items.title_zh: "宝贝,别动": 澳大利亚女人醒来发现胸口有大蟒蛇
items.summary: In the middle of the night on Monday, Rachel Bloor stirred in her bed to find a heavy weight curled up on her chest.
items.summary_zh: 周一半夜,Rachel Bloor在床上出事 发现胸口卷起一身重物

items.title: Trump threatens to invoke Insurrection Act to quell anti-ICE protests in Minnesota
items.title_zh: 特朗普威胁要援引"叛乱法案"来平息明尼苏达州反ICE的抗议活动.
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has threatened to invoke the rarely used Insurrection Act to quell unrest over federal immigration enforcement operations in Minneapolis.
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)威胁要援引很少使用的"叛乱法"来平息明尼阿波利斯联邦移民执法行动的骚乱.

items.title: How realistic is India's quest for magnets made of rare earths
items.title_zh: 印度对由稀土制成的磁铁的追求是多么现实
items.summary: In November 2025, India approved a 73bn-rupee ($800m; £600m) plan that could help it to cut its dependence on China in one of the most strategic corners of the global supply chain: rare earth magnets.
items.summary_zh: 2025年11月,印度批准了73bn-rupee(800m;600m英镑)计划,可以帮助其在全球供应链最具战略意义的一角:稀土磁铁中减少对中国的依赖.

items.title: Actor Timothy Busfield charged with sexually abusing boys on set of TV series
items.title_zh: 演员Timothy Busfield被控在电视连续剧中性虐待男孩
items.summary: Actor Timothy Busfield has made his first court appearance after turning himself in on criminal charges that he allegedly sexually abused two boys on the set of a TV series filmed in New Mexico, prosecutors say.
items.summary_zh: 检察官说,演员蒂莫西·布斯菲尔德(Timothy Busfield)在自首后首次出庭,他被指控在新墨西哥州拍摄的电视连续剧中性虐待了两个男孩。

items.title: Israel moves Yellow Line deeper into Gaza, satellite images show
items.title_zh: 以色列将黄线深入加沙,卫星图像显示
items.summary: Israel has moved the blocks which are supposed to mark its post-ceasefire line of control deeper into Gaza in several places, sowing confusion among Palestinians.
items.summary_zh: 以色列已把本应标有停火后控制线的路障移入加沙若干地方,在巴勒斯坦人中间制造混乱。

items.title: Landscape beneath Antarctica's icy surface revealed in unprecedented detail
items.title_zh: 南极洲冰冷地表下的地貌 展现出前所未有的细节
items.summary: A new map has unmasked the landscape beneath Antarctica's ice in unprecedented detail, something scientists say could greatly enhance our understanding of the frozen white continent.
items.summary_zh: 一张新地图将南极洲冰下地貌解开, 其细节是史无前例的, 科学家们说这可以大大增进我们对冰冻的白色大陆的理解。

items.title: Chinese woman's plea for help killing pigs draws thousands to her village
items.title_zh: 中国女人要杀猪的恳求 吸引了上千人来到她村子
items.summary: When Daidai realised her father was too old to slaughter two pigs for a traditional community feast in the run-up to Chinese New Year, she turned to social media.
items.summary_zh: Daidai意识到她的父亲太老了,不能在中新年前为传统社区宴会宰了两头猪,她转向了社交媒体.

items.title: Troops and vessels from European Nato allies arrive in Greenland
items.title_zh: 欧洲纳托同盟的部队和船只抵达格陵兰
items.summary: BBC Europe editor Katya Adler is in Greenland where troops and ships from several European states are gathering.
items.summary_zh: BBC欧洲编辑Katya Adler在格陵兰,

items.title: Morocco celebrates Afcon win: 'Today is about couscous not jollof'
items.title_zh: 摩洛哥庆祝Afcon胜出:今天的比赛是"Couscous Not jollof".
items.summary: Morocco defeated Nigeria in a penalty shootout to advance to the Afcon final.
items.summary_zh: 摩洛哥击败尼日利亚进行罚枪决 晋级阿夫孔决赛.

items.title: What happens in space during a medical emergency?
items.title_zh: 医疗紧急情况下在太空会怎样?
items.summary: Four astronauts evacuated from the International Space Station (ISS) have landed back on Earth, after their stay in space was cut short by a month due to a "serious" medical issue.
items.summary_zh: 国际空间站(ISS)撤离的4名宇航员由于"严重"医疗问题被缩短了在太空停留1个月后已返回地球.

items.title: Watch: Astronauts return to Earth after medical evacuation
items.title_zh: 观察:宇航员在医疗后送后返回地球
items.summary: Four astronauts who left the International Space Station (ISS) a month early due to one of the crew members falling ill have returned to Earth on Thursday.
items.summary_zh: 由于一名乘员生病而提前一个月离开国际空间站(ISS)的4名宇航员已经于星期四返回地球.

items.title: Watch: Aerial footage shows cars swept away by flash floods in Australia
items.title_zh: 观察:空中镜头显示澳大利亚被山洪冲走的汽车
items.summary: Australia's Great Ocean Road, famous for its scenic coastal views, was forced to close on Thursday after flash floods triggered by a storm hit the state of Victoria.
items.summary_zh: 澳大利亚的"大海洋道"以风景优美的海岸风景而出名,在一场风暴袭击维多利亚州后爆发了山洪后于星期四被迫关闭.
